memory: User is overall enjoying their semester and has gained confidence in their problem-solving and time management skills. They used to dread tougher CS classes but now feel more capable, even if they still pull the occasional late night for debugging or last-minute assignments. Being a senior has helped them realize that with effort and focus on their goals, they can figure things out. They believe their biggest takeaway after four years is learning to be resourceful, collaborative, and critical thinkers. They find the tough classes rewarding and feel that their current work is directly contributing to their future career.
